name: Yosenju Kama 4
text:
If this card is Normal Summoned, you can: Immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 "Yosenju" monster from your hand, except "Yosenju Kama 4". When this card is Normal Summoned, apply the following effects in sequence based on the number of "Yosenju" monsters you control with different names.
1- Add 1 "Yosenju monster from your Deck to your hand.
2- "Yosenju" monsters you currently control gain 1000 ATK.
3- You take no damage until the end of the next turn.
4- Your opponent cannot Summon monsters from the Extra Deck until the end of the next turn.
5- Your opponent cannot activate Monster effects until the end of the next turn.
You can only use this effect of "Yosenju Kama 4" once per turn. During the End Phase, if this card was Normal Summoned this turn: Return it to the hand.
